short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assassin’s Creed Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Assassin’s Creed background. Assassin’s Creed themes for game fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Experience a new Assassin’s Creed wallpaper every time you open a tab.
2. Enjoy a random Assassin’s Creed background or set your favorite via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your emails and social media profiles.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Create notes to keep track of your tasks.
7. Quick navigation to your most visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add and access favorite websites quickly.
10. Instant connection to Google apps.
11. Explore additional themes easily.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. One-click wallpaper downloads.
14. Fast access to online gaming.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Assassin’s Creed new tab.
